Hmm... did you use scaling on the bones in max? The exporter doesn't handle that, since there's no scaling of bones in md5.

Another possibility where things go wrong is the weights of the skin modifier. From reading your CV I assume you're familiar with how the skin modifier works so that's probably not the reason.
